text: 18:5 Nehemia 9:29; Esekiel 18:9; 20:11-13; Luk 10:28; Rom 10:5; Galesia 3:12Ia bizir kɨ damuasa ia mɨkemeziba ko arazir kɨ ifongezibar gɨn mangɨ. Gumazamiziba Moses Osirizir Araziba mɨgei moghɨn damu egh dughiaba zurara dar amutɨ, arazir kaba me damutɨ, me ikɨvɨra ikiam. Kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God, kɨ kamaghɨn mɨkeme.
